name: Build a REST API
description: Build a complete REST API from requirements to deployment

steps.name: Requirements Gathering
steps.description: Understand what endpoints, data models, and business logic are needed. Interview the user to clarify scope, authentication needs, and integration points.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Clear list of endpoints, data models, and authentication requirements documented

steps.name: Architecture Design
steps.description: Design the API architecture: routing structure, middleware stack, database schema, error handling strategy, and response format conventions.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Architecture document with endpoint specifications, database schema, and middleware design

steps.name: Project Setup
steps.description: Initialize the project, install dependencies, configure the development environment, and create the base project structure with health check endpoint.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Project compiles/runs with basic health check endpoint responding to GET /health

steps.name: Data Models
steps.description: Implement database models, migrations, seed data, and the data access layer. Set up connection pooling and query helpers.
steps.acceptance_criteria: All models created, migrations run successfully, seed data loads correctly

steps.name: API Endpoints
steps.description: Implement all CRUD endpoints with proper request validation, error handling, pagination, and response formatting.
steps.acceptance_criteria: All endpoints respond correctly to valid and invalid requests with proper HTTP status codes

steps.name: Authentication
steps.description: Implement authentication and authorization (JWT, API keys, or session-based). Add middleware for protected routes, token refresh, and role-based access control.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Protected endpoints require valid authentication, unauthorized requests return 401/403

steps.name: Testing
steps.description: Write unit tests for business logic, integration tests for API endpoints, and edge case tests for error handling. Set up test fixtures and helpers.
steps.acceptance_criteria: All tests pass, coverage above 80%, both happy path and error cases covered

steps.name: Documentation
steps.description: Generate API documentation (OpenAPI/Swagger spec), write README with setup instructions, and add inline code documentation.
steps.acceptance_criteria: OpenAPI spec generated, README with setup/run/test instructions, key functions documented

steps.name: Deployment Setup
steps.description: Create Dockerfile, docker-compose for local development, CI/CD pipeline configuration, environment variable management, and production deployment guide.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Docker image builds successfully, CI pipeline defined, deployment configuration ready
